Name: Repair the lighthouse in Desorock Highland
Description: Tacet Discords threaten the engineer on her way to the lighthouse. Provide her with escort.
QuestDesc: Tacet Discords threaten the engineer on her way to the lighthouse. Provide her with escort.

Dialogues.Speaker: Junior Engineer
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Chief asked me to get some parts for him to help with the repairs on that old lighthouse. It was supposed to be an easy job...

Dialogues.Speaker: Junior Engineer
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But I didn't expect all these TDs to come out of nowhere. Now what am I going to do? Chief's gonna blow a fuse.

Dialogues.Speaker: Junior Engineer
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Rover, if you're making your way up to that lighthouse, do you think you could escort me there?

Dialogues.Speaker: Experienced Engineer
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What took you so long...? Did you go slacking off again?

Dialogues.Speaker: Junior Engineer
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Chief! I can explain! It was those TDs. I-I wanted to get back as fast I could. You can ask Rover what happened.

Dialogues.Speaker: Experienced Engineer
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: All right. I'll let it slide this time... Well, since you still got your arms and legs, get over here and give me a hand with this thing, will ya?

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The engineers fixed up the the lighthouse in no time.

Dialogues.Speaker: Experienced Engineer
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: There. Don't know how many years this old hunk of building's got in it, but the people who built it did a good reliable job. Most of the equipments inside are still in running condition.

Dialogues.Speaker: Experienced Engineer
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Now, you can get up there and see what you can find, Rover. You should be able to get the console going.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (A set of coordinates appeared on-screen after the recording.)

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (I should check out these coordinates I see what I can find.)

Dialogues.Speaker: Beacon Terminal
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Verifying Ship Registration>>>>> Extracting latest log entryâ€”Complete

Dialogues.Speaker: Beacon Terminal
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ship Registration [NUS8910]>>>>> Initiating voice recording

Dialogues.Speaker: "NUS8910"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This is Acting Captain Moak of the Stingray... Today is our forty-third day since our departure from the harbor.

Dialogues.Speaker: "NUS8910"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Xie Qi reported the ship's first sighting of a lighthouse's light beam from up on the highlands. We followed it and arrived at these coordinates in preparation for landing...

Dialogues.Speaker: "NUS8910"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: To our surprise, not a single person was found on the shores, only the lighthouse projecting its lonely light... Not a very assuring sight to say the least.

Dialogues.Speaker: "NUS8910"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Xie Qi insisted on staying... As an engineer, he wanted to stay behind and modify the communications equipment of the lighthouse.

Dialogues.Speaker: "NUS8910"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: In his words, with necessary modifications in place should make communication with other survivors possible. He'll inform us when the time comes... We hope his efforts will not go in vain.

Dialogues.Speaker: "NUS8910"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Since Xie Qi's the brightest out of any of us, he wouldn't have suggested it if he didn't know what he was doing. We respected his decision and provided him some of the supplies before setting sail again.

Dialogues.Speaker: Junior Engineer
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Come to think of it. TDs are so unpredictable. There's no way of knowing where and when they're going to pop out.

Dialogues.Speaker: Junior Engineer
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I can't even imagine how people managed to deal with them back in the old days.

Dialogues.Speaker: Junior Engineer
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: *sigh* I think I might of jinxed myself. There they go again, appearing out of thin air... Almost scared myself to death.

Dialogues.Speaker: Junior Engineer
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I don't know how you're keeping a straight face while you fight TDs like that. Must be a perk of being a Resonator.

Dialogues.Speaker: Junior Engineer
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If it were a normal person... All they can do is run for their lives. Just like me. *sigh*

Dialogues.Speaker: Experienced Engineer
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Taken an interest in this here lighthouse have you, Rover?

Dialogues.Speaker: Experienced Engineer
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The lighthouse looks like it was built ages ago. Should be operational with some patching up here and there.

Dialogues.Speaker: Experienced Engineer
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We're still missing a few parts for the repairs. I already had my assistant go fetch some at the edge of the hill.

Dialogues.Speaker: Experienced Engineer
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: She's been gone for quite a while now. I'm guessing she's probably caught in some trouble. What will I do with her...
